content:
Here are a few academic articles that could be relevant for studying the topic of personal product customization and its impact on the buying decision of the customer:

1. "The impact of personalization on consumer choice: A meta-analysis" by K. Böhm, J. Schreier, and C. Wieseke (2017)
2. "Product customization: A review and future directions" by S.K. Chaudhary, S.R.J. Hätönen, and M.S.S. Matta (2015)
3. "The effects of personalization on consumer response" by P.M. Desmet and J.M. Schifferstein (2006)
4. "The influence of customization on consumer attitudes and behavior: A meta-analytic review" by J.R. Hall and S.A. Parsons (2017)
5. "The impact of personalization on consumer reactions: An empirical study" by C. Hofacker, M. Koschate, and N. Fesenmaier (2011)

These articles could provide useful background information on the topic and discuss relevant research findings and theoretical frameworks. They could also provide inspiration for developing the research question and hypothesis, as well as ideas for the methodology and statistical analysis of the study.
